mapper.select: SELECT D.AUCTION_NO, D.START_PRICE, D.BUY_PRICE, D.START_AT, D.END_AT, D.STATUS, D.ART_NO, D.TITLE, D.CONTENTS, D.ART_TYPE, D.WIDTH, D.HEIGHT, D.USER_NO, D.NICKNAME, D.CATEGORY_NO, D.CATEGORY_NAME, D.PRICE, D.BID_NO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AUC.AUCTION_NO DESC) AS RN, AUC.AUCTION_NO, AUC.START_PRICE, AUC.BUY_PRICE, AUC.START_AT, AUC.END_AT, AUC.STATUS, A.ART_NO, A.TITLE, A.CONTENTS, A.ART_TYPE, A.WIDTH, A.HEIGHT, U.USER_NO, U.NICKNAME, C.CATEGORY_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, B.BID_NO, B.PRICE FROM AUCTION_T AUC, ART_T A, USER_T U, CATEGORY_T C, BID_T B WHERE AUC.ART_NO = A.ART_NO AND A.SELLER_NO = U.USER_NO AND A.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO AND AUC.AUCTION_NO = B.AUCTION_NO(+) AND (B.PRICE IS NULL OR B.PRICE = (SELECT MAX(PRICE) FROM BID_T WHERE AUCTION_NO = AUC.AUCTION_NO))) D WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT D.AUCTION_NO, D.START_PRICE, D.BUY_PRICE, D.START_AT, D.END_AT, D.STATUS, D.ART_NO, D.TITLE, D.CONTENTS, D.ART_TYPE, D.WIDTH, D.HEIGHT, D.USER_NO, D.NICKNAME, D.CATEGORY_NO, D.CATEGORY_NAME, D.PRICE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AUC.AUCTION_NO DESC) AS RN, AUC.AUCTION_NO, AUC.START_PRICE, AUC.BUY_PRICE, AUC.START_AT, AUC.END_AT, AUC.STATUS, A.ART_NO, A.SELLER_NO, A.TITLE, A.CONTENTS, A.ART_TYPE, A.WIDTH, A.HEIGHT, U.USER_NO, U.NICKNAME, C.CATEGORY_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, B.BID_NO, B.PRICE FROM AUCTION_T AUC, ART_T A, USER_T U, CATEGORY_T C, BID_T B WHERE AUC.ART_NO = A.ART_NO AND A.SELLER_NO = U.USER_NO AND A.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO AND AUC.AUCTION_NO = B.AUCTION_NO(+) AND (B.PRICE IS NULL OR B.PRICE = (SELECT MAX(PRICE) FROM BID_T WHERE AUCTION_NO = AUC.AUCTION_NO)) AND AUC.AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo}) D
